prompt_base: photorealistic portrait of a handsome American martial artist, lean muscular physique, long blonde hair, confident smile, determined gaze, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: realistic hair strands, sun-kissed skin texture, detailed cotton fabric weave on karate gi, visible muscle definition, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, flat lighting, messy face, neon red, low quality, blurry, (short hair:1.2), weak, sad expression
